alert.note: Alert for Butte; Harding; Perkins (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Extreme Fire Danger issued October 20 at 3:15AM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: .DISCUSSION...Skies will be mostly sunny today with high temperatures in the 70s to around 80 degrees. Westerly winds of 10 to 20 mph can be expected across much of the area this afternoon. Wind gusts to around 30 mph are expected across northwest South Dakota. Relative humidities will drop into the teens this afternoon. ...EXTREME FIRE DANGER... The grassland fire danger index will reach the extreme category this afternoon. Extreme weather conditions and very low moisture content of grasses, and other dry organic material on the ground, indicate that critical burning conditions exist. All fires have the potential to become large and spread quickly becoming erratic with extreme behavioral characteristics. No outdoor burning should take place. The outlook for Friday afternoon, The grassland fire danger index will reach the moderate category to high category.
